snippet.title: Fisherman’s Bait: Marlin Challenge Arcade
snippet.description:
The game has three selectable modes of play: Beginner (Tutorial), All Fish Challenge(Normal mode all fish allowed) and Billfish Challenge (Billboard fishing). 
Some of the fish that appear in the game are blue marlin, swordfish, striped marlin and tarpon.

During the play, you must choose a fishing spot and watch the radar to help you detect where the fish are located and then cast your reel. 
After you have caught a fish, pull the reel towards you until the rod mark bends to the max. 
The tension gauge will decrease if you push the reel forward quickly. You must try to reel the line in quickly.
The game is time based, catching fishes increase it, the big they are, bigger is time added to the counter, also there is a ranking system based on fishes weight.

In the final level a (very bishi bashi)pirate ask for your help to catch a monstrous catfish, he won't be satisfied until you pick the bigger one and it's also very challenging.


Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
